评论详情: I love this backpack. It is the perfect size for everyday use. Not too bulky and looks cute too. The little bear is a nice little touch. One of my favorite purchases.

The bag isn't very wide front-to-back, but I'm impressed with how much it holds. It also has a cushioned section in the back perfect for a small laptop, which I wasn't expecting. I love the handles so I can carry it like a bag instead of putting it on my back. I'm a digital nomad and I need good, usable bags for traveling; I can either pack this full and still have it not appear oversized, or I can use it for daily outings when I'm carrying less. At full capacity I can fit into this bag: one pair of thick denim leggings, 2 pairs of yoga shorts, 1 pair of yoga capris, 4 cotton dresses, 1 bathing suit, 2 lightweight long sleeve shirts, 1 oversized tank top, 1 pair of cotton drawstring pants, bras and underwear, 1 pair of flip flops, and various toiletries/travel necessities. (When I have it that full, I carry my computer in a separate bag.) Everything fits easily and it's small enough that it can easily be taken as a carry-on. Airlines are cracking down on size and weight of bags. No one is even stopping me to question how much it weighs because it appears small.  One thing: the straps are cotton and they rapidly start to fray. If you don't catch it right away the whole thing is going to unravel. Run a line of superglue over the end of the straps as soon as you open the package, and problem solved. I also feel like the cotton straps may slip right out of the buckle when I'm carrying it over my shoulder, and it may crash to the ground with my computer inside (this never actually happened). I put an oversized safety pin to hold the straps at my desired length.
Works well, has held up to alot of abuse. Zippers all work well. Nice little backpack.

评论概述: Perfect bag to have when you're out with the littles!
评论详情: LOVEEEEEE - this is one of the most perfect little backpacks when you're out with littles. Holds a lot without being bulky, and is small enough that some of the larger littles can even give a hand carrying it sometimes. Definitely recommend!

I ordered the army green in this cute little backpack which features three external Velcro enclosed pockets, backpack straps, and handbag straps. On the inside it has a padded pocket that could hold something like a laptop, a main compartment, and then some smaller interior pockets that don’t have closures. All in all I think it’s great for the price. Time will tell on the quality.
This bag is cheaply made. It doesn’t have a lot of compartments. It doesn’t clean up easily once dirty. Water bottles don’t fit into the side pockets well.

评论概述: Good backup but not very sturdy.
评论详情: Firstly, I will say that the color is really nice.  It's a minimalist bag that's going to work with every outfit. It's very versatile, in terms of style.  It has a 14 inch laptop sleeve, which is really useful.  The issue I have is that the material is very thin. It doesn't seem durable or sturdy. Especially compared to other backpacks.  Another big con is the lack of pockets. There is not much room to store your things. Thus, it is limited compared to other backpacks.  Overall, while the backpack is a good value for money, I would honestly recommend you spend a bit more for something nicer and a bit sturdier.
I like this backpack it is stylish and functional. It holds a lot of items and I like that the arm straps are not very long, so the backpack does not rest on your lower back.

评论概述: Useful smaller type backpack...or is it a handbag?
评论详情: I got this backpack/handbag primarily as to use for the times I have a smaller load to carry and can't say I'm disappointed at all in this item. On the exterior, there are 3 pockets - 1 on the front, 1 on each side. The interior is divided, with a large pocket on the back part and then the space on the other side of the divider. Now the divider and the back side of the pack have about 1/4' foam in them, which provides the only cushioning in the pack. The odd part of the item is the fact that it has both back pack straps and the cloth handbag style handles - not really sure why. But I figured that, although I plan on primarily using it as a backpack, maybe there will be times it'll be easier to carry with the handbag handles...maybe? One last detail - the zipper handles are metal (not the usual plastic) and have holes in them large enough to put a lock through. Overall, given the affordable price, I'd say this is a good quality backpack that will prove useful for trips around the city.

I used this black backpack as my personal bag on the plane for an international trip to Italy. I carried it around a long time on my back and wore it several days as we walked numerous miles, and it held up great and has no damage. It's very lightweight and did not irritate my shoulders or back even after wearing it all day.  Though it's a little on the small side, it was able to hold quite a lot -- I was able to stuff a purse, large water bottle, food, a book, and a change of clothes in it with plenty of room to spare. Make sure to read the measurements to see if it will suit your purposes. The straps are a little confusing to set up, but they never moved out of place once I adjusted them to fit me. It's probably safe to wash in the washing machine, which I will probably be testing soon as it got dirty. Overall, a very affordable and durable backpack.

When I ordered this backpack I thought it was going to be smaller but the size it is, is perfect, I can carry all my books and in comparison to my last backpack it weighs less, even if you put lots of things you won’t feel much weight, I put 7 books, a pencilcase, an iPad and a few other things and it wasn’t very heavy. The only thing I find a bit annoying is that if you leave it a few days out it gets very dusty and it’s a bit annoying cleaning the dust out in that material, but other than that the backpack is great!

This is a nice sized backpack. It's smaller than your typical bookbag, but larger than a mini backpack. It's a good in-between size. A nice daypack for wandering around the city. Or for a casual hike. The fabric isn't rigid at all, so your back will be supporting the weight of everything inside. But for the size, you probably won't be carrying too large of a load. I like the handles up top that allow you to carry it like a tote as well. It's stylish and useful.

Daughter needed a smaller travel bag (ie not for school stuff). I ordered her this and she likes it. I examined it and it is well made. I don't like the velcro attachments on the side pockets. The velcro is too strong and if you grab from the fabric rather than the velcro, I think it might rip off.  The back straps are thinner, which is fine because this is a dual purpose bag which can also be carried. I think it's a fun little bag, surprisingly well made (apart from that pocket velcro which I would change to a snap). It's also attractive and stylish.

The size works perfectly for me. It's not enough for my laptop, but it has space when needed and is a nice medium size for a casual purse. I love the two handles, so you can carry it as a bag. They look nice and work well. It is a lot lighter and softer than it looks. That means that I can scrunch it up when needed. The pockets on the side and in front are perfect for things like water bottles, bug spray, eye glasses, phones, note pad, etc. The hook-and-loop closures are much handier than zippers. It even comes with the little bear shown on the picture.

the little teddy bear that comes with it is cute  The medium size is perfect for my work items, I can fit a 32 oz hydration bottle on the side pocket and it does not stretch. the canvas straps make it easy to pick up and go and if I need free hands I could always put it on as a backpack. there are no frills for this bag. it's very lightweight and I can probably use it for airplane travel. bag has lots of space on the inside and a padded pocket which is good size for an ipod.  The outside of the material feels like a rain jacket. I sprayed water on it and it beaded off then took a rag and wiped it down.  and if the bag is not in use, it does not take up much space when it is stored

My favorite feature is that the bag is so lightweight yet durable enough. It’s also waterproof. The shape is odd though, the bag is very wide in comparison to other backpacks I’ve previously owned. The bag is simple. It has a front pocket, one large pocket with a smaller pocket (I’m assuming this is for a laptop) and 2 side pockets that close. So if you put a water bottle in the side pocket you’ll have to keep it open. The bag also has handles.

I like that the bag is waterproof. I don’t like that the pockets on the outside have Velcro and not zíppers. You won’t be able to put smaller items in the pockets or they’ll fall out. Additionally, water can get inside the pockets, which kind of defeats the waterproof aspect of the bag. The material is very thin and the straps thin as well. I do like the cute little teddy bear.

Made well, stitching is good, zipper is strong enough for work, straps are strong, Plenty of room for storage and plenty of pockets, black color is deep.  Very comfortable, to carry around, comes with a stuffed bear with one eye 😉, my daughter loves it.  Definitely recommend

I absolutely love the versatility of this bag, and I'm sure you will, too. Especially if you are a person who wears many hats in the course of a day. This is perfect for my small laptop, and doubles as an excellent short hike backpack in the shoulder seasons when gloves, hats and scarves are quickly shed and passed to Mom to hold. The style is minimalist, which I loved. Sleek lines, durable (waterproof) fabric, and pockets where you need them, this bag is built for utility. Yet it's stylish in its simplicity. I really can't say enough about how comfortable it is and how intuitive/well-placed the zippers and pockets are. This is packed with kindness, and includes a sweet key chain teddy bear that likely isn't standard, yet made all the difference. This backpack will serve for so many special outings, and a sweet treat in the box served to bring joy. My rating is for the backpack, not the tender gift. But I do think this gift says something about the company marketing it and that matters. So, pay kindness forward. Have fun. Hike lots. Strap this to your back, shoulder, or use as a laptop carrier--for all your adventures. You'll be glad you did!
This backpack is versatile and light weight. Could easily be used as a day bag, diaper bag, or school backpack (couldn’t fit a ton of large textbooks).

My child is super hard on her backpacks, so I never know how they will hold up after the first couple weeks of school. This backpack has held up wonderfully, with no tears or broken zippers, like would usually be the case, with how hard she is on them. She was excited about the color being sage green and it having an extra set of straps on top of the backpack, so it can be carried like a handbag as well. This bag has room for her laptop and four decent sized school textbooks. The external side pockets are perfect spots to easily access, but securely hold, any writing utensils or cellphones . The only thing she mentioned, and I agree, is the straps would benefit from a little extra padding. Otherwise this is a great option overall for a backpack.

Super spacious backpack, sturdy material, lots of pockets, and a cute design. This backpack is great! It's perfect for carrying my macbook, books, and other items! Seriously, it's a great bag and I love it!

This backpack surprised me. The stitching is perfect, both inside and out. I did turn it inside out to check.  The backpack is lightweight and has one big padded pocket inside, for a laptop, tablet, books, etc. and two medium sized open pockets.  The outside has a pocket in the front with a strong Velcro closure and one on each side, also with Velcro closures. The side pockets are deep and hold water bottles, that don’t fall out, huge plus.  The shoulder straps are padded and adjustable. The only thing I didn’t like was that the straps are not threaded through the connectors and I struggled a little bit with that, but not enough to deduct a star.  For this review, I poured some water on it and it ran right off. This has become my new favorite backpack because it is lightweight, yet simple.
Love the color but the bag is not structurally great. It is flimsy so it doesn't hold its shape. I use it to hold m son's snacks and extra set of clothes so it does it job nicely.

评论概述: Sleek utilitarian low-profile backpack for the city and cute stuffed animal
评论详情: The backpack was surprisingly well-designed without the superfluous bells and whistles that weigh down other bags. It carries a lot and I appreciate the side pockets for water and umbrella.  Waterproof, too. The inner pocket fit my MacBook Air. I guess if you have a lot of bits and bobs you may want an organizer inside although there are pockets on the outside. For me, weight was the most important factor and my previous backpack had so many pockets and dividers it was just weighed down by them. My only preemptive concern is how strong the straps are. I liked that part of the straps were cushioned for comfort. The part that attaches to the backpack is secured with extra fabric, although I hope it’s secure enough. My previous backpack was thick canvas, which felt very secure. Here, I needed waterproof, which is thinner material by nature, so I’ll see how it holds up with the gargantuan amounts I carry every day. Took it for a test run in the rain and it held up well!

This bag is waterproof and definitely feels like it since the material reminds me of swimsuit material. Due to that though, I find the durability of the bag to be a little weak because of that. Then again, for the price of the bag I think that's fine. It feels more like a light travel bag that you might bring on a shopping trip or something of that sort. I also really like that it's waterproof so you wouldn't have to worry if it rains or snows. A bonus as well since it came with a little bear to attach to the bag!

This bookbag was ordered for my daughter and. She absolutely loves it. It's not huge but just enough space for what she carries in it. I did apply htv to it and it's stuck nicely with no heat damage. Arrived on time and is exactly as described

I like this backpack. There are lots of compartments, which I like...a place for your water bottle...plenty of room for your books and notebooks. Its compact, so it's not large, but it doesn't need to be because there's lots of room for what you need. Lightweight which is a huge plus as it wont weigh you down! The material is nice. 5 star.
